comment.author: 35687899@N00
comment._content: George Whitefield Davis (July 26, 1839 – July 12, 1918) was an engineer and Major General in the United States Army. He also served as a military Governor of Puerto Rico and as the first military Governor of the Panama Canal Zone. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_Whitefield_Davis
